name: VIRTUA
sampleDescriptions: Protecting the imputed floor policy for all-urban states, Stark law reform, opioid legislation, telehealth

Protecting the imputed floor policy for all-urban states, Stark law reform, telehealth, Pandemic and All Hazards Preparedness Act, Substance Use-Disorder Prevention that Promotes Opioid Recovery and Treatment for Patients and Communities Act, CY Hospital Outpatient Prospective Payment Rule, CMS RFI on Anti-Kickback Statute & Stark Law

Substance Use-Disorder Prevention that Promotes Opioid Recovery and Treatment (SUPPORT) for Patients and Communities Act, Pandemic All-Hazards Preparedness and Advancing Innovation (PAHPAI) Act of 2019, Network Adequacy and Surprise Billing, Imputed Rural Floor, Site-neutral Payment for E/M Services at Off-Campus HOPDs.

Alternatives to Opioids (ALTO) Demonstration program funding, Resident Physician Shortage Act of 2019 S. 348) - Increased funding for Medicare GME slots, Surprise Medical Bills (pending legislation), Medicaid DSH cuts, Improving Access to Medicare Coverage Act (H.R. 1682/S. 753) - Addressing the Medicare 3-Day Rule for nursing home care, Home Health Payment Innovation Act (S. 433) - Limit Medicare rate changes to 2 percent per year, Protecting Jessica Grubbs Legacy Act (S. 1012) - Federal privacy rules (42 CFR Part 2), Overdose Prevention and Patient Safety Act (H.R. 2062) - Federal privacy rules (42 CFR Part 2), Palliative Care and Hospice Education Act, Protecting Pre-Existing Conditions & Making Health Care More Affordable Act, State Allowance for a Variety of Exchanges (SAVE) Act (H.R. 1385)
